abstract: Cleveland Cavaliers forward Kevin Love undergoes surgery on his left shoulder and will miss four to six months while recovering; other NBA news noted.
lead_paragraph: Love, who was injured in Cleveland’s series-clinching win at Boston on Sunday, had surgery on his dislocated left shoulder and may need six months to recover.

headline.main: Kevin Love Has Surgery and Will Miss Four to Six Months
headline.print_headline: Cavaliers’ Love Has Surgery on Dislocated Shoulder

snippet: Love, who was injured in Cleveland’s series-clinching win at Boston on Sunday, had surgery on his dislocated left shoulder and may need six months to recover.
